name: Color Coliar
description:
GDS Jam 2020 submission

Theme: Disinformation and Conspiracy theory

Here are the rules!

  • Pressing "W" will move you up
  • Pressing "D" will move you right
  • Pressing "A" will move left
  • Pressing "S" will move you down
  • Pressing "R" will reset the level
  • Pressing "E" will bring up a random image
  • Black tiles will act as walls
  • Brown tiles will also act as walls
  • Red tiles will kill you
  • Light blue tiles will also kill you
  • Green tiles are the goal
  • White and Pink tiles will have no effect
  • Yellow tiles will also have no effect
  • Purple tiles will slow you down
  • Orange tiles will speed you up

Got it? Doesn't matter. Because each level, half of these statements will be false and the remaining statements will hold true. Just know, 2 colors will be harmful, 3 will have no effect, 1 will slow you down, 1 will speed you up, 2 will act as walls, and 1 will be the goal.

Can you beat the Color Coliar?

Everything made in 2 days by Phamility, https://twitter.com/TheAgileIndie
